metadata.title: CVE-2016-10074 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The mail transport (aka Swift_Transport_MailTransport) in Swift Mailerbefore 5.4.5 might allow remote attackers to pass extra parameters to themail command and consequently execute arbitrary code via a \" (backslashdouble quote) in a crafted e-mail address in the (1) From, (2) ReturnPath,or (3) Sender header.

criterions.comment: libphp-swiftmailer package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
